forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 57F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain late. Low 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 15C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 41F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 56F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 39F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 56F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 43F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.
